summary: Adds JWT-based admin authentication (`POST /api/login`) and secures all admin APIs + UI with bearer tokens.

changes.description: Defined ingest flow expectations (`POST /api/ingest/{slot_id}`) and media TTL behaviour.
Outlined admin APIs for slots, settings, statistics and public results delivery.
Added draft OpenAPI 3.1 specification for ingest endpoint, referencing multipart and error schemas.
Expanded ingest OpenAPI with examples and SLA description.
Refined provider contracts for Gemini and Turbotext (limits, protocols, error handling).
Simplified ingest media support to JPEG/PNG/WebP across PRD, SDD, and contracts.
Introduced `/api/slots/{slot_id}/test-run` and `job_history.source` to distinguish admin test executions.
Replaced prompt/template form fields with `slot_payload` JSON overrides for `/api/slots/{slot_id}/test-run` and added `completed_in_seconds` to responses. Documentation updated accordingly.
Added `/api/stats/slots`, success/timeout KPI fields and frontend guidance for SLA dashboards.
Introduced JWT login (`POST /api/login`), bearer security for admin APIs, and documented token handling (scope `admin`, TTL 168 ч, throttling).
Admin slot APIs now require template_media items to include `role`; merge behaviour preserves existing bindings for test-run and slot updates. OpenAPI updated accordingly.

notes: Template media bindings now carry required role field; admin slot save/test-run expect role and merge overrides without wiping existing bindings.
